text.p: These are the leading stories in Skopje press on Friday. Reuters has not verified them nor does it vouch for their accuracy.

- Macedonian parliament dismissed central bank governor and vice-governor, Borko Stanoevski and Tome Nenovski. It appointed former deputy prime minister Ljube Trpevski the central bank governor on President Kiro Gligorov's nomination.

- Several hundred of ethnic Albanians gathered outside Gostivar municipality on Thursday protesting against the constitutional court decision temporarily banning public display of Albanian and Turkish flags. -- Mircela Casule, Skopje newsroom +389 91 201 196
